gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 108, Pacers 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Pacers, 108-103. Caris LeVert put up 23 points, eight rebounds and 11 assists for the Cavaliers, while Jarrett Allen added 23 points and nine rebounds in the victory. Tyrese Haliburton tallied 14 points, six rebounds and 12 assists for the Pacers in the losing effort. The Cavaliers improve to 43-25 on the season, while the Pacers fall to 38-31.
